about_the_game:
"Gakuen Handsome Fighters" is a single-player 2D action game. Characters from the 2010 romance adventure game "Gakuen Handsome" appear as dots in the game. Players fight using punches, kicks, and special moves.

Story
One day after school, the handsome boys of Rosemont High School play with a cat on the rooftop. However, the cat is kidnapped by a mysterious flying object. The handsome guys start to run to save the cat, but many monsters block their way along the way. Can they save the kitty?

Operation Methods
Directional key: Move
A key or X button: Punch
D key or B button: Kick
S key or A button: Jump, Decide
W key or Y button: Special move
Enter or START button: Pause, Decide

Game System
About Gauges
The heart-shaped gauge is the maximum strength (max. 6), and when it runs out, the player dies.
The star-shaped gauge is the number of special moves you can use (MAX is 2).
The number in the upper left corner is the number of remaining moves (max. 2), and the game is over when this number runs out.

About Special Moves
Special Moves can be used up to 2 times per stage. The number of uses can be restored with items.

About items
Pudding: Restores all the player's energy.
Dumplings: Restores the number of times a special move can be used.
Life: Restores all remaining units.

If the game does not start even if the system requirements are met, please refer to this page.

name: 学園ハンサムFighters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Gakuen Handsome Fighters" is a single-player 2D action game. The handsome boys fight using punches, kicks, and special moves.
